law.catch_line: Unless a person holds a license issued by the Secretary the person may not:...
law.text:
Unless a person holds a license issued by the Secretary the person may not:
Offer or perform medical laboratory tests or examinations in this State;
Represent or service in this State a medical laboratory regardless of the laboratory's location; or
Offer or perform medical laboratory tests or examinations on specimens acquired from health care providers in this State at a medical laboratory located outside this State.
